definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: “If there's a real hash, the client can get infections,” says Kingsley.
sentences.chinese: “如果處理失當，客戶可能會感染，”金斯利說。

sentences.english: This problem was not properly handled.
There have also been instances where members of the public have reacted inappropriately to displays of naked art.
sentences.chinese: 民衆對裸體藝術展覽反應失當的事件也時有發生。

sentences.english: Besides he mentioned that the treatment by HK Sanitarium was negligent and improper.
sentences.chinese: 另外，他又指養和醫院治療時疏忽失當。

sentences.english: Currently there exists a great amount of inappropriateness in quotes in Chinese journalism.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國新聞報道在引語使用方面存在大量失當現象。
